title: Ginger and Lime-Glazed Corn on the Cob
directions: Prepare the grill for direct cooking over medium heat.
In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, stir the glaze ingredients and bring to a boil. Continue to boil until the glaze slightly thickens, 5 to 7 minutes. Keep the glaze warm.
Mix and brush the glaze all over the corn.
Grill the corn over direct medium heat, with the lid closed as much as possible. Cook until it is browned in spots and tender, 10 to 15 minutes, turning several times.
Transfer to a platter and baste with the remaining glaze.
